OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord race ( African-American v Caucasian ) gender ( male v female ) . Patients undergo 45-60 minute interview obtain information variation symptom perception , assessment , patient-physician communication process . Patients assess sociodemographic characteristic ( i.e , education , gender , age , insurance status , employment status , income , race/ethnicity , religiosity ) , information close confidant ( i.e. , relationship , family history cancer , caregiver/decision-making status ) , physician characteristic . Patients also assess Trust Health Care System , DMPQ , RCS , Brief COPE scale , Lukwago Religiosity scale , RAND Social Support Survey questionnaires . Patient chart review obtain medical data .
